pl_output:
Welcome farmer_john
There are currently 5 plaintext samples in the database
[`Nview` plaintext?]
To add a new sample, contact the owner of this script.
In order to add to the key using a currently known source of plaintext,
pass the `Ns`criptor and `Na`rgs that lead to the text, as well as
the `Nid` of the plaintext in the database
Example usage:
abndnd_c7k7vn.beecryption {`Ns`:`V#s.``Chivetech``V.``Lrepo_zenith_19f4b8`, a:{}, id:"passphrase"}
or:
abndnd_c7k7vn.beecryption {t:"encrypted text", id:"passphrase"}
In order to add specific letter to the key, you will need to provide
both the `Nl`etter as well as the `Ne`ncrypted substitution.
If you would like to attempt to decrypt unknown text using the current stored key,
simply input the text you would like to `Nd`ecode.
In case of rotation, `Nreset` the key cache.
